title: Myths & Facts About Covid-19 Vaccines
content:
. Getting sick with COVID-19 offers protection from future illness. This protection is sometimes called “natural immunity.” The level of protection people get from a COVID-19 infection may vary depending on how mild or severe their illness was, the time since their infection, and their age.
Getting a COVID-19 vaccine can provide
added protection for people who already had COVID-19
.
Learn about why you should
get vaccinated even if you already had COVID-19
.
